name: 2021 11th International Conference on Education, Research and Innovation
content: Paper publication: All papers submitted to the ICERI2021, will be published in one of those two journals below: Option A: International Journal of Information and Education Technology (IJIET) ISSN: 2010-3689 DOI: 10.18178/IJIET Indexing: Scopus (Since 2019), EI(INSPEC, IET), Electronic Journals Library, Google Scholar, Crossref, etc. Option B: International Journal of Innovation, Management and Technology (IJIMT) ISSN: 2010-0248 DOI: 10.18178/IJIMT Indexing: Google Scholar, Ulrich's Periodicals Directory, Engineering & Technology Digital Library, Crossref and ProQuest, Electronic Journals Library.
